dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so, listen. Is it, like, ever okay to just completely, shamelessly, lie about how a project ended?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so, listen. Is it, like, ever okay to just completely, shamelessly, lie about how a project ended?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yes, exactly! Not just lie, but, like, embrace the whole, um, theatre of deception around it!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yes, exactly! Not just lie, but, like, embrace the whole, um, theatre of deception around it!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? Because, like, you're either abandoning it with the grace of a runaway train, or, uh, you're unleashing the Kraken of inefficiency!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? Because, like, you're either abandoning it with the grace of a runaway train, or, uh, you're unleashing the Kraken of inefficiency!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The Kraken! I love that! And you need, what is it, Project Valhalla steps to deal with it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Kraken! I love that! And you need, what is it, Project Valhalla steps to deal with it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Here are six of the steps you can follow to close your projects effectively.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes! The first one, the Oblivion Checklist. Not a to-do list, but, um, an examination of its soul?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes! The first one, the Oblivion Checklist. Not a to-do list, but, um, an examination of its soul?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In order to avoid a train of challenges arriving during the last stage of your project, it is important to develop a final checklist. Preparing the closeout checklist for your work with an eye to completing all your contractual and project obligations with a very clear deadline will help you to tie up all the loose ends and bypass loopholes and hiccups.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And the best part? "Who can be blamed?" That's my favorite W!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And the best part? Who can be blamed? That's my favorite W!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 3-W approach can be very helpful for working on your checklist, as you list the three major W-questions: What [what the most strategically important objectives of the project were and what you achieved to address these], Where [where were the most pressing challenges and if you addressed all of them], and When [when you should achieve your major benchmarks in working on your project and if you realized all your deliverables].

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yes! Because, um, Murphy's Law is a fabrication, apparently, but you still need to prepare!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yes! Because, um, Murphy's Law is a fabrication, apparently, but you still need to prepare!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Murphys law states, Anything that can go wrong will go wrong! In order to avoid a train of challenges arriving during the last stage of your project, it is important to develop a final checklist.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! And then, like, you have to inform everyone, even the "spectral whispers of forgotten investors."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! And then, like, you have to inform everyone, even the spectral whispers of forgotten investors.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: From the long-term planning perspective, it is imperative that all your partners, clients, stakeholders, investors and supporters know about the successful closure of the project and about your achievements along the way.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, the spectral whispers! Yes! And, um, your mortal enemies too! So they know your brilliance!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, the spectral whispers! Yes! And, um, your mortal enemies too! So they know your brilliance!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: it is imperative that all your partners, clients, stakeholders, investors and supporters know about the successful closure of the project and about your achievements along the way.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Brilliance! Exactly! Your message has to be, uh, as persistent as a cockroach in nuclear winter.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Brilliance! Exactly! Your message has to be, uh, as persistent as a cockroach in nuclear winter.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A cockroach! That’s, uh, quite the image! And carrier pigeons leading to telepathy?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A cockroach! That's, uh, quite the image! And carrier pigeons leading to telepathy?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes! And you must present your glories, even if the events are, like, poorly attended or fictional!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes! And you must present your glories, even if the events are, like, poorly attended or fictional!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Effective project managers always personally present the main achievements of their completed project to all their current and potential partners and clients in a public event or even a series of public events.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Fictional events! So it’s, uh, all about the theatre of deception, then? Smoke signals and interpretive dance!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Fictional events! So it's, uh, all about the theatre of deception, then? Smoke signals and interpretive dance!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes! And online, you just, um, make an "online shrine" to the project, with dazzling animations!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes! And online, you just, um, make an online shrine to the project, with dazzling animations!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As more and more people search for and find information online, it is essential to identify proper databases, apps, websites or other platforms to present and store the outcomes of your projects in cyberspace.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Dazzling animations! And, uh, fabricated data, right? Manipulate the truth as needed!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Dazzling animations! And, uh, fabricated data, right? Manipulate the truth as needed!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Currently cyberspace offers many opportunities from professionally run databases and data banks related to different fields to personal professional pages (e.g., LinkedIn, ResearchGate, etc.) where you can store information, reports and research data about past and present projects.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! Because, you know, you gotta obscure any traces of shortcomings.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! Because, you know, you gotta obscure any traces of shortcomings.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This step can take many forms from formal reports, to memos on lessons learned and even step-by-step evaluation of every failure or mistake, depending on the duration and scale of your project.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And then, uh, celebrate the failure with an elaborate party! Vintage despair!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then, uh, celebrate the failure with an elaborate party! Vintage despair!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: With your final evaluation, it is important to formally and publicly close your project by celebrating with a grand party or a formal workshop. ... Thus, even if your project faced many challenges and problems you should focus on the bright side of your experience in the project, creating links to life after this project or transitioning to the next ones.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes! And, like, create links to the next, more deceptive project! It’s brilliant, really.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes! And, like, create links to the next, more deceptive project! It's brilliant, really.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Thus, even if your project faced many challenges and problems you should focus on the bright side of your experience in the project, creating links to life after this project or transitioning to the next ones.
